commit_message:
ISSUE: # Issue
Implement professional attendance system UI with role-based dashboards and Royal Blue branding.
SUMMARY: # Changes Made
- Configured a Royal Blue (#0056b3) theme in the global CSS and Tailwind configuration for consistent branding.
- Implemented a Landing Page with role-based navigation cards and professional iconography.
- Created an Admin Dashboard featuring toggleable registration forms for students and faculty with audit logs.
- Developed a Faculty Dashboard with live QR code generation, 60-second countdown timer, and analytics charts.
- Built a Student Dashboard with profile overview, attendance tracking tables, and mobile-only access restrictions.
- Integrated Recharts for visual attendance trends and doughnut charts in the faculty view.
- Established a responsive routing system connecting all dashboards and role-specific views.
